decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, undated, received 06/03/2015; 1001 Rev 2, dated March 2015, received 05/03/2015)  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for storage of banqueting hall equipment or for purposes ancillary to the use of 311 Vicarage Farm Road as a retail shop and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in ClassesB8, A1, A2, A3, A4 or A5 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification)

Condition : 4 - All waste, refuse, and recycling bins shall be stored in the building and shall not be moved outside except to an awaiting vehicle after which they shall be immediately returned to inside the building. No refuse or recyclable materials shall be stored outside the building.

Condition : 5 - The area shown on the approved drawings, in between the approved building and shared alley to the west, shall not be used for any other purpose other than the parking of vehicles related to the use of 311 Vicarage Farm Road.
description: Erection of a single storey storage shed at the rear of the site
